title: Connection
fullText:
The cord extension socket, cord extension set and socket outlet types used for low voltage socket outlet connections shall be as follows:
(a)	Single-phase—
(i)	AS/NZS 3112 (3-pin flat pin) up to 15 A;
(ii)	AS/NZS 3120 (3-pin flat pin) up to 15 A;
(iii)	AS/NZS 3123 (round pins) above 15 A; or
A1	(iv)	IEC 60309-2 (round pins) above 15 A.
(b)	Three-phase—
(i)	AS/NZS 3123 (round pins) above 15 A; or
A1	(ii)	IEC 60309-2 (round pins) above 15 A.
When cord extension socket, cord extension set and socket outlet types exceeding the current ratings available for the above listed Standards are required, the detachable connection fittings should conform with other Australian, Australian/New Zealand or international Standards requirements.
